text.autoconfig.ding.title: Ding Options
text.autoconfig.ding.option.name: Name
text.autoconfig.ding.option.name.@Toolti: Minecraft name of sound file to play when Minecraft is loaded
This can also be a mod sound if the mod is installed.
text.autoconfig.ding.option.pitch.@Toolt: Pitch of the sound to play when Minecraft is loaded
